name: jquery.event.gevent
description: Global events jQuery Plugin. Use native jQuery events for SPA communication instead of some fleeting framework library. Subcribe a function to a global event for each element in a jQuery collection. This plugin is featured in the book [Single page web applications - JavaScript end-to-end](http://manning.com/mikowski). Methods include **subscribe**, **publish**, and **unsubscribe**. This is similar to jQuery global custom events support which was removed from jQuery 1.9.
author: Michael S. Mikowski <mike.mikowski@gmail.com>
jquery_extra: Keys below are not used by the npm manifest
title: Global custom events
